wikipedia_page.main: John C. McGregor (born 1851) was a Scottish footballer, who played for Vale of Leven and Scotland. McGregor played four times for Scotland and scored one goal, in a 7–2 victory against England in 1878.

response: John MacGregor, John Macgregor or John McGregor may refer to:
* John McGregor (footballer, born 1851), Scottish international football player
* John McGregor (footballer, born 1900) (1900–1993), English football player
* John McGregor (footballer, born 1963), Scottish football player
* John McGregor (Upper Canada politician) (c. 1751–1828), businessman and political figure in Upper Canada
* unknown date – John McGregor (d. unknown), Scotland international in four matches (1877–1880).
